data.name: Cool Kid Cody - Season 1 Episode 02
data.detailed_description:
Season 1 Episode 2: Nightmare on Loser Street!
Before Cody can ascend to Godhood he’s gotta pass the week long Chill Assessment Test. First stop, the basement!

~~~

In a world of Losers, Cool Kids and Gods, where Losers wish they were Cool Kids, Cool Kids wish they were Gods and Gods rule over all, Cool Kid Cody embarks on his quest for Godhood! All he's gotta do is achieve the impossible: transform the biggest Loser in school into a Cool Kid. Should he fail, he might just lose his cool.

Cool Kid Cody is an interactive point & click cartoon series!

Key Features

  • Interact with the world using point & click mechanics!
  • Collect items, make choices and explore in order to progress the story!
  • Find bonus photos scattered across each episode!
  • Keep your skateboard powered up by making the coolest choice for the coolest scenes!

Episode 1 is free to play with the rest of Season 1's episodes being released as DLC. Episodes are released every Friday starting April 8th - June 10th. Stay tuned!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 128 MB RAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 or above
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 128 MB RAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or later
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 128 MB RAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
